entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
